title: Hodges Coffee House and Restaurant
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offer a variety of vegetarian and vegan food. Vegan dishes are cooked and prepared separately from meat. On the menu is a house-made vegan burger served with hummus, tramezzini with roasted vegetables; a marinated tofu and greens salad; and a vegan BLT. Makes its own vegan bacon and sausage. Wheat-free options include granola with fruit and soy milk. Drinks can be served with soy milk.
streetAddress: The Colony Shopping Centre, Craighall Park
